aerobatics_1.name: Aerobatics 1
aerobatics_1.description: If unit's HP = 100%, unit can move to a space adjacent to any infantry, armored, or cavalry ally within 2 spaces.

aerobatics_2.name: Aerobatics 2
aerobatics_2.description: If unit's HP ≥ 50%, unit can move to a space adjacent to any infantry, armored, or cavalry ally within 2 spaces.

aerobatics_3.name: Aerobatics 3
aerobatics_3.description: Unit can move to a space adjacent to any infantry, armored, or cavalry ally within 2 spaces.

atk_cantrip_1.name: Atk Cantrip 1
atk_cantrip_1.description: If Sing or Dance is used, inflicts Atk-3 on nearest foes within 4 spaces of unit through their next actions.

atk_cantrip_2.name: Atk Cantrip 2
atk_cantrip_2.description: If Sing or Dance is used, inflicts Atk-5 on nearest foes within 4 spaces of unit through their next actions.

atk_cantrip_3.name: Atk Cantrip 3
atk_cantrip_3.description: If Sing or Dance is used, inflicts Atk-7 on nearest foes within 4 spaces of unit through their next actions.

atk/def_link_1.name: Atk/Def Link 1
atk/def_link_1.description: If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition, Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets unit, grants Atk/Def+2 to unit and target ally or unit and targeting ally for 1 turn.

atk/def_link_2.name: Atk/Def Link 2
atk/def_link_2.description: If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition, Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets unit, grants Atk/Def+4 to unit and target ally or unit and targeting ally for 1 turn.

atk/def_link_3.name: Atk/Def Link 3
atk/def_link_3.description: If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition, Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets unit, grants Atk/Def+6 to unit and target ally or unit and targeting ally for 1 turn.

atk/def_ruse_1.name: Atk/Def Ruse 1
atk/def_ruse_1.description: If a Rally Assist skill is used by unit or targets unit, inflicts Atk/Def-1 and【Guard】on foes in cardinal directions of unit and target through their next actions.【Guard】Inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on target per attack during combat through its next action. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

atk/def_ruse_2.name: Atk/Def Ruse 2
atk/def_ruse_2.description: If a Rally Assist skill is used by unit or targets unit, inflicts Atk/Def-3 and【Guard】on foes in cardinal directions of unit and target through their next actions.【Guard】Inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on target per attack during combat through its next action. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

atk/def_ruse_3.name: Atk/Def Ruse 3
atk/def_ruse_3.description: If a Rally Assist skill is used by unit or targets unit, inflicts Atk/Def-5 and【Guard】on foes in cardinal directions of unit and target through their next actions.【Guard】Inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on target per attack during combat through its next action. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

atk_feint_1.name: Atk Feint 1
atk_feint_1.description: If a Rally Assist skill is used by unit or targets unit, inflicts Atk-3 on foes in cardinal directions of unit through their next actions.

atk_feint_2.name: Atk Feint 2
atk_feint_2.description: If a Rally Assist skill is used by unit or targets unit, inflicts Atk-5 on foes in cardinal directions of unit through their next actions.

atk_feint_3.name: Atk Feint 3
atk_feint_3.description: If a Rally Assist skill is used by unit or targets unit, inflicts Atk-7 on foes in cardinal directions of unit through their next actions.

atk/res_link_1.description: If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition, Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets unit, grants Atk/Res+2 to unit and target ally or unit and targeting ally for 1 turn.

(Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

atk/spd_ruse_2.description: If a Rally Assist skill is used by unit or targets unit, inflicts Atk/Spd-3 and【Guard】on foes in cardinal directions of unit and target through their next actions.【Guard】Inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on target per attack during combat through its next action. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

axebreaker_1.name: Axebreaker 1
axebreaker_1.description: If unit's HP ≥ 90% in combat against an axe foe, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack and foe cannot make a follow-up attack.

axebreaker_2.name: Axebreaker 2
axebreaker_2.description: If unit's HP ≥ 70% in combat against an axe foe, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack and foe cannot make a follow-up attack.

axebreaker_3.name: Axebreaker 3
axebreaker_3.description: If unit's HP ≥ 50% in combat against an axe foe, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack and foe cannot make a follow-up attack.

b_tomebreaker_1.name: B Tomebreaker 1
b_tomebreaker_1.description: If unit's HP ≥ 90% in combat against a blue tome foe, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack and foe cannot make a follow-up attack.

b_tomebreaker_2.name: B Tomebreaker 2
b_tomebreaker_2.description: If unit's HP ≥ 70% in combat against a blue tome foe, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack and foe cannot make a follow-up attack.

b_tomebreaker_3.name: B Tomebreaker 3
b_tomebreaker_3.description: If unit's HP ≥ 50% in combat against a blue tome foe, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack and foe cannot make a follow-up attack.

belief_in_love.name: Belief in Love
belief_in_love.description: If foe initiates combat or if foe's HP = 100% at start of combat, inflicts Atk/Def-5 on foe during combat.

beorc's_blessing.name: Beorc's Blessing
beorc's_blessing.description: Neutralizes cavalry and flying foes' bonuses (from skills like Fortify, Rally, etc.) during combat.(Skill cannot be inherited.)

binding_shield.name: Binding Shield
binding_shield.description: In combat against a dragon foe, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack and foe cannot counterattack or make a follow-up attack.

blaze_dance_1.name: Blaze Dance 1
blaze_dance_1.description: If Sing or Dance is used, grants Atk+2 to target.

blaze_dance_2.name: Blaze Dance 2
blaze_dance_2.description: If Sing or Dance is used, grants Atk+3 to target.

blaze_dance_3.name: Blaze Dance 3
blaze_dance_3.description: If Sing or Dance is used, grants Atk+4 to target.

bold_fighter_1.name: Bold Fighter 1
bold_fighter_1.description: If unit's HP = 100% and unit initiates combat, grants Special cooldown charge +1 per unit's attack, and unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack. (Does not stack.)

bold_fighter_2.name: Bold Fighter 2
bold_fighter_2.description: If unit's HP ≥ 50% and unit initiates combat, grants Special cooldown charge +1 per unit's attack, and unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack. (Does not stack.)

bold_fighter_3.name: Bold Fighter 3
bold_fighter_3.description: If unit initiates combat, grants Special cooldown charge +1 per unit's attack, and unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack. (Does not stack.)

bowbreaker_1.name: Bowbreaker 1
bowbreaker_1.description: If unit's HP ≥ 90% in combat against a colorless bow foe, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack and foe cannot make a follow-up attack.

bowbreaker_2.name: Bowbreaker 2
bowbreaker_2.description: If unit's HP ≥ 70% in combat against a colorless bow foe, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack and foe cannot make a follow-up attack.

bowbreaker_3.name: Bowbreaker 3
bowbreaker_3.description: If unit's HP ≥ 50% in combat against a colorless bow foe, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack and foe cannot make a follow-up attack.

brash_assault_1.name: Brash Assault 1
brash_assault_1.description: If unit initiates combat against a foe that can counter and unit's HP ≤ 30%, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack.

brash_assault_2.name: Brash Assault 2
brash_assault_2.description: If unit initiates combat against a foe that can counter and unit's HP ≤ 40%, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack.

brash_assault_3.name: Brash Assault 3
brash_assault_3.description: If unit initiates combat against a foe that can counter and unit's HP ≤ 50%, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack.

caldera_dance_1.name: Caldera Dance 1
caldera_dance_1.description: If Sing or Dance is used, grants Atk+2 and Def+3 to target.

caldera_dance_2.name: Caldera Dance 2
caldera_dance_2.description: If Sing or Dance is used, grants Atk+3 and Def+4 to target.

cancel_affinity_1.name: Cancel Affinity 1
cancel_affinity_1.description: Neutralizes all weapon-triangle advantage granted by unit's and foe's skills.

cancel_affinity_2.name: Cancel Affinity 2
cancel_affinity_2.description: Neutralizes weapon-triangle advantage granted by unit's skills. If unit has weapon-triangle disadvantage, neutralizes weapon-triangle advantage granted by foe's skills.

cancel_affinity_3.name: Cancel Affinity 3
cancel_affinity_3.description: Neutralizes weapon-triangle advantage granted by unit's skills. If unit has weapon-triangle disadvantage, reverses weapon-triangle advantage granted by foe's skills.

chill_atk_1.name: Chill Atk 1
chill_atk_1.description: At start of turn, inflicts Atk-3 on foe on the enemy team with the highest Atk through its next action.

chill_atk_2.name: Chill Atk 2
chill_atk_2.description: At start of turn, inflicts Atk-5 on foe on the enemy team with the highest Atk through its next action.

chill_atk_3.name: Chill Atk 3
chill_atk_3.description: At start of turn, inflicts Atk-7 on foe on the enemy team with the highest Atk through its next action.

chill_atk/res_1.name: Chill Atk/Res 1
chill_atk/res_1.description: At start of turn, inflicts Atk/Res-3 on foe on the enemy team with the highest Atk+Res total through its next action.

chill_atk/res_2.name: Chill Atk/Res 2
chill_atk/res_2.description: At start of turn, inflicts Atk/Res-5 on foe on the enemy team with the highest Atk+Res total through its next action.

chill_atk/spd_1.name: Chill Atk/Spd 1
chill_atk/spd_1.description: At start of turn, inflicts Atk/Spd-3 on foe on the enemy team with the highest Atk+Spd total through its next action.

chill_atk/spd_2.name: Chill Atk/Spd 2
chill_atk/spd_2.description: At start of turn, inflicts Atk/Spd-5 on foe on the enemy team with the highest Atk+Spd total through its next action.

chill_def_1.name: Chill Def 1
chill_def_1.description: At start of turn, inflicts Def-3 on foe on the enemy team with the highest Def through its next action.

chill_def_2.name: Chill Def 2
chill_def_2.description: At start of turn, inflicts Def-5 on foe on the enemy team with the highest Def through its next action.

chill_def_3.name: Chill Def 3
chill_def_3.description: At start of turn, inflicts Def-7 on foe on the enemy team with the highest Def through its next action.

chill_res_1.name: Chill Res 1
chill_res_1.description: At start of turn, inflicts Res-3 on foe on the enemy team with the highest Res through its next action.

chill_res_2.name: Chill Res 2
chill_res_2.description: At start of turn, inflicts Res-5 on foe on the enemy team with the highest Res through its next action.

chill_res_3.name: Chill Res 3
chill_res_3.description: At start of turn, inflicts Res-7 on foe on the enemy team with the highest Res through its next action.

chill_spd_1.name: Chill Spd 1
chill_spd_1.description: At start of turn, inflicts Spd-3 on foe on the enemy team with the highest Spd through its next action.

chill_spd_2.name: Chill Spd 2
chill_spd_2.description: At start of turn, inflicts Spd-5 on foe on the enemy team with the highest Spd through its next action.

chill_spd_3.name: Chill Spd 3
chill_spd_3.description: At start of turn, inflicts Spd-7 on foe on the enemy team with the highest Spd through its next action.

chill_spd/def_1.name: Chill Spd/Def 1
chill_spd/def_1.description: At start of turn, inflicts Spd/Def-3 on foe on the enemy team with the highest Spd+Def total through its next action.

chill_spd/def_2.name: Chill Spd/Def 2
chill_spd/def_2.description: At start of turn, inflicts Spd/Def-5 on foe on the enemy team with the highest Spd+Def total through its next action.

chill_spd/res_1.name: Chill Spd/Res 1
chill_spd/res_1.description: At start of turn, inflicts Spd/Res-3 on foe on the enemy team with the highest Spd+Res total through its next action.

chill_spd/res_2.name: Chill Spd/Res 2
chill_spd/res_2.description: At start of turn, inflicts Spd/Res-5 on foe on the enemy team with the highest Spd+Res total through its next action.

chilling_seal.name: Chilling Seal
chilling_seal.description: At start of turn, if unit's HP ≥ 50%, inflicts Atk/Spd-6 on foe on the enemy team with the lowest Def through its next action. (Skill cannot be inherited.)

close_call_1.name: Close Call 1
close_call_1.description: If unit's Spd > foe's Spd, reduces damage from attacks during combat and from area-of-effect Specials (excluding Røkkr area-of-effect Specials) by percentage = difference between stats × 2 (max 20%). If unit initiates combat, unit moves 1 space away after combat.

close_call_2.name: Close Call 2
close_call_2.description: If unit's Spd > foe's Spd, reduces damage from attacks during combat and from area-of-effect Specials (excluding Røkkr area-of-effect Specials) by percentage = difference between stats × 3 (max 30%). If unit initiates combat, unit moves 1 space away after combat.

close_call_3.name: Close Call 3
close_call_3.description: If unit's Spd > foe's Spd, reduces damage from attacks during combat and from area-of-effect Specials (excluding Røkkr area-of-effect Specials) by percentage = difference between stats × 4 (max 40%). If unit initiates combat, unit moves 1 space away after combat.

crusader's_ward.name: Crusader's Ward
crusader's_ward.description: If unit receives consecutive attacks and foe's Range = 2, reduces damage from foe's second attack onward by 80%. (Skill cannot be inherited.)

daggerbreaker_1.name: Daggerbreaker 1
daggerbreaker_1.description: If unit's HP ≥ 90% in combat against a colorless dagger foe, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack and foe cannot make a follow-up attack.

daggerbreaker_2.name: Daggerbreaker 2
daggerbreaker_2.description: If unit's HP ≥ 70% in combat against a colorless dagger foe, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack and foe cannot make a follow-up attack.

daggerbreaker_3.name: Daggerbreaker 3
daggerbreaker_3.description: If unit's HP ≥ 50% in combat against a colorless dagger foe, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack and foe cannot make a follow-up attack.

daring_fighter_1.name: Daring Fighter 1
daring_fighter_1.description: If unit initiates combat, neutralizes effects that prevent unit's follow-up attacks during combat. If unit's HP ≤ 40% and unit initiates combat, unit can make a follow-up attack before foe can counterattack.

daring_fighter_2.name: Daring Fighter 2
daring_fighter_2.description: If unit initiates combat, neutralizes effects that prevent unit's follow-up attacks during combat. If unit's HP ≤ 60% and unit initiates combat, unit can make a follow-up attack before foe can counterattack.

daring_fighter_3.name: Daring Fighter 3
daring_fighter_3.description: If unit initiates combat, neutralizes effects that prevent unit's follow-up attacks during combat. If unit's HP ≤ 80% and unit initiates combat, unit can make a follow-up attack before foe can counterattack.

dazzling_staff_1.name: Dazzling Staff 1
dazzling_staff_1.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP = 100%, foe cannot counterattack.

dazzling_staff_2.name: Dazzling Staff 2
dazzling_staff_2.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 50%, foe cannot counterattack.

deadly_balance.name: Deadly Balance
deadly_balance.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 50% or if【Penalty】is active on unit, inflicts Atk/Def-5 on foe and grants Special cooldown charge +1 per foe's attack during combat. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack. Special cooldown charge granted even if foe's attack deals 0 damage.)【Penalty】All effects that last "on foe through its next action." Includes penalties inflicted by a skill like Panic or Threaten and negative status effects (preventing counterattacks, restricting movement, or the effects of a skill like Triangle Adept or Guard).

def_feint_1.name: Def Feint 1
def_feint_1.description: If a Rally Assist skill is used by unit or targets unit, inflicts Def-3 on foes in cardinal directions of unit through their next actions.

def_feint_2.name: Def Feint 2

def_feint_3.name: Def Feint 3
def_feint_3.description: If a Rally Assist skill is used by unit or targets unit, inflicts Def-7 on foes in cardinal directions of unit through their next actions.

(Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

def/res_ruse_2.name: Def/Res Ruse 2
def/res_ruse_2.description: If a Rally Assist skill is used by unit or targets unit, inflicts Def/Res-3 and【Guard】on foes in cardinal directions of unit and target through their next actions.【Guard】Inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on target per attack during combat through its next action. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

def/res_ruse_3.name: Def/Res Ruse 3
def/res_ruse_3.description: If a Rally Assist skill is used by unit or targets unit, inflicts Def/Res-5 and【Guard】on foes in cardinal directions of unit and target through their next actions.【Guard】Inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on target per attack during combat through its next action. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

deluge_dance_1.name: Deluge Dance 1
deluge_dance_1.description: If Sing or Dance is used, grants Spd+2 and Res+3 to target.

deluge_dance_2.name: Deluge Dance 2
deluge_dance_2.description: If Sing or Dance is used, grants Spd+3 and Res+4 to target.

desperation_1.name: Desperation 1
desperation_1.description: If unit's HP ≤ 25% and unit initiates combat, unit can make a follow-up attack before foe can counterattack.

desperation_2.name: Desperation 2
desperation_2.description: If unit's HP ≤ 50% and unit initiates combat, unit can make a follow-up attack before foe can counterattack.

desperation_3.name: Desperation 3
desperation_3.description: If unit's HP ≤ 75% and unit initiates combat, unit can make a follow-up attack before foe can counterattack.

disarm_trap_1.name: Disarm Trap 1
disarm_trap_1.description: While attacking in Aether Raids, if unit ends movement on a space with a Bolt Trap or a Heavy Trap and that trap's level ≤ 1, cancels trap's effect.

disarm_trap_2.name: Disarm Trap 2
disarm_trap_2.description: While attacking in Aether Raids, if unit ends movement on a space with a Bolt Trap or a Heavy Trap and that trap's level ≤ 3, cancels trap's effect.

disarm_trap_3.name: Disarm Trap 3
disarm_trap_3.description: While attacking in Aether Raids, if unit ends movement on a space with a Bolt Trap or a Heavy Trap, cancels trap's effect.

double_lion.name: Double Lion
double_lion.description: If unit's HP = 100% at start of combat and unit initiates combat, unit attacks twice, but deals 1 damage to unit after combat. (Does not stack.)

drag_back.name: Drag Back
drag_back.description: If unit initiates combat, unit moves 1 space away after combat.Target foe moves to unit's previous space.

dull_close_1.name: Dull Close 1
dull_close_1.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP = 100% and foe uses sword, lance, axe, dragonstone, or beast damage, neutralizes foe's bonuses (from skills like Fortify, Rally, etc.) during combat.

dull_close_2.name: Dull Close 2
dull_close_2.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 50% and foe uses sword, lance, axe, dragonstone, or beast damage, neutralizes foe's bonuses (from skills like Fortify, Rally, etc.) during combat.

dull_close_3.name: Dull Close 3
dull_close_3.description: If foe uses sword, lance, axe, dragonstone, or beast damage, neutralizes foe's bonuses (from skills like Fortify, Rally, etc.) during combat.

dull_ranged_1.name: Dull Ranged 1
dull_ranged_1.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP = 100% and foe uses bow, dagger, magic, or staff, neutralizes foe's bonuses (from skills like Fortify, Rally, etc.) during combat.

dull_ranged_2.name: Dull Ranged 2
dull_ranged_2.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 50% and foe uses bow, dagger, magic, or staff, neutralizes foe's bonuses (from skills like Fortify, Rally, etc.) during combat.

dull_ranged_3.name: Dull Ranged 3
dull_ranged_3.description: If foe uses bow, dagger, magic, or staff, neutralizes foe's bonuses (from skills like Fortify, Rally, etc.) during combat.

earth_dance_1.name: Earth Dance 1
earth_dance_1.description: If Sing or Dance is used, grants Def+3 to target.

earth_dance_2.name: Earth Dance 2
earth_dance_2.description: If Sing or Dance is used, grants Def+4 to target.

earth_dance_3.name: Earth Dance 3
earth_dance_3.description: If Sing or Dance is used, grants Def+5 to target.

escape_route_1.name: Escape Route 1
escape_route_1.description: If unit's HP ≤ 30%, unit can move to a space adjacent to any ally.

escape_route_2.name: Escape Route 2
escape_route_2.description: If unit's HP ≤ 40%, unit can move to a space adjacent to any ally.

escape_route_3.name: Escape Route 3
escape_route_3.description: If unit's HP ≤ 50%, unit can move to a space adjacent to any ally.

even_pulse_tie_1.name: Even Pulse Tie 1
even_pulse_tie_1.description: At start of even-numbered turns, if any foe's HP+5 ≤ unit's HP and that foe's Special is ready, inflicts Special cooldown count+2 on foe with the lowest HP among those foes. (Cannot exceed the foe's maximum Special cooldown.)

even_pulse_tie_2.name: Even Pulse Tie 2
even_pulse_tie_2.description: At start of even-numbered turns, if any foe's HP+3 ≤ unit's HP and that foe's Special is ready, inflicts Special cooldown count+2 on foe with the lowest HP among those foes. (Cannot exceed the foe's maximum Special cooldown.)

even_pulse_tie_3.name: Even Pulse Tie 3
even_pulse_tie_3.description: At start of even-numbered turns, if any foe's HP+1 ≤ unit's HP and that foe's Special is ready, inflicts Special cooldown count+2 on foe with the lowest HP among those foes. (Cannot exceed the foe's maximum Special cooldown.)

fireflood_dance_1.name: Fireflood Dance 1
fireflood_dance_1.description: If Sing or Dance is used, grants Atk+2 and Res+3 to target.

fireflood_dance_2.name: Fireflood Dance 2
fireflood_dance_2.description: If Sing or Dance is used, grants Atk+3 and Res+4 to target.

firestorm_dance_1.name: Firestorm Dance 1
firestorm_dance_1.description: If Sing or Dance is used, grants Atk/Spd+2 to target.

firestorm_dance_2.name: Firestorm Dance 2
firestorm_dance_2.description: If Sing or Dance is used, grants Atk/Spd+3 to target.

flier_formation_1.name: Flier Formation 1
flier_formation_1.description: If unit's HP = 100%, unit can move to a space adjacent to a flying ally within 2 spaces.

flier_formation_2.name: Flier Formation 2
flier_formation_2.description: If unit's HP ≥ 50%, unit can move to a space adjacent to a flying ally within 2 spaces.

flier_formation_3.name: Flier Formation 3
flier_formation_3.description: Unit can move to a space adjacent to a flying ally within 2 spaces.

follow-up_ring.name: Follow-Up Ring
follow-up_ring.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 50%, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack.(Skill cannot be inherited.)

freezing_seal.name: Freezing Seal
freezing_seal.description: At start of turn, if unit's HP ≥ 50%, inflicts Atk/Spd-6 on foe on the enemy team with the lowest Res through its next action.

g_tomebreaker_1.name: G Tomebreaker 1
g_tomebreaker_1.description: If unit's HP ≥ 90% in combat against a green tome foe, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack and foe cannot make a follow-up attack.

g_tomebreaker_2.name: G Tomebreaker 2
g_tomebreaker_2.description: If unit's HP ≥ 70% in combat against a green tome foe, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack and foe cannot make a follow-up attack.

g_tomebreaker_3.name: G Tomebreaker 3
g_tomebreaker_3.description: If unit's HP ≥ 50% in combat against a green tome foe, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack and foe cannot make a follow-up attack.

gale_dance_1.name: Gale Dance 1
gale_dance_1.description: If Sing or Dance is used, grants Spd+2 to target.

gale_dance_2.name: Gale Dance 2
gale_dance_2.description: If Sing or Dance is used, grants Spd+3 to target.

gale_dance_3.name: Gale Dance 3
gale_dance_3.description: If Sing or Dance is used, grants Spd+4 to target.

geyser_dance_1.name: Geyser Dance 1
geyser_dance_1.description: If Sing or Dance is used, grants Def/Res+3 to target.

geyser_dance_2.name: Geyser Dance 2
geyser_dance_2.description: If Sing or Dance is used, grants Def/Res+4 to target.

guard_1.name: Guard 1
guard_1.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP = 100%, inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on foe per attack. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

guard_2.name: Guard 2
guard_2.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 90%, inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on foe per attack. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

guard_3.name: Guard 3
guard_3.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 80%, inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on foe per attack. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

guard_bearing_1.name: Guard Bearing 1
guard_bearing_1.description: During unit's first combat in enemy phase, if foe initiates combat, reduces damage from foe's first attack by 30%.

guard_bearing_2.name: Guard Bearing 2
guard_bearing_2.description: During unit's first combat in enemy phase, if foe initiates combat, reduces damage from foe's first attack by 40%.

guard_bearing_3.name: Guard Bearing 3
guard_bearing_3.description: During unit's first combat in enemy phase, if foe initiates combat, reduces damage from foe's first attack by 50%.

hit_and_run.name: Hit and Run
hit_and_run.description: If unit initiates combat, unit moves 1 space away after combat.

holy_war's_end.name: Holy War's End
holy_war's_end.description: If unit's HP ≥ 50% and foe initiates combat, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack before foe can counterattack.

killing_intent.name: Killing Intent
killing_intent.description: At start of combat, if foe's HP < 100% or if【Penalty】is active on foe, inflicts Spd/Res-5 on foe, and if unit initiates combat, unit can make a follow-up attack before foe can counterattack.【Penalty】All effects that last "on foe through its next action." Includes penalties inflicted by a skill like Panic or Threaten and negative status effects (preventing counterattacks, restricting movement, or the effects of a skill like Triangle Adept or Guard).

knock_back.name: Knock Back
knock_back.description: If unit initiates combat, target foe moves 1 space away after combat.

lancebreaker_1.name: Lancebreaker 1
lancebreaker_1.description: If unit's HP ≥ 90% in combat against a lance foe, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack and foe cannot make a follow-up attack.

lancebreaker_2.name: Lancebreaker 2
lancebreaker_2.description: If unit's HP ≥ 70% in combat against a lance foe, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack and foe cannot make a follow-up attack.

lancebreaker_3.name: Lancebreaker 3
lancebreaker_3.description: If unit's HP ≥ 50% in combat against a lance foe, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack and foe cannot make a follow-up attack.

light_and_dark.name: Light and Dark
light_and_dark.description: Inflicts Atk/Spd/Def/Res-2 on foe, neutralizes foe's bonuses (from skills like Fortify, Rally, etc.), and disables foe's skills that "calculate damage using the lower of foe's Def or Res" during combat.

live_for_bounty.name: Live for Bounty
live_for_bounty.description: If unit survives, get 1.5x shards/crystals from a Training Tower map.(Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

live_for_honor.name: Live for Honor
live_for_honor.description: If unit survives, get 1.5x badges from a Training Tower map.(Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

live_to_serve_1.name: Live to Serve 1
live_to_serve_1.description: When healing an ally with a staff, restores HP to unit = 50% of HP restored to target.

live_to_serve_2.name: Live to Serve 2
live_to_serve_2.description: When healing an ally with a staff, restores HP to unit = 75% of HP restored to target.

live_to_serve_3.name: Live to Serve 3
live_to_serve_3.description: When healing an ally with a staff, restores HP to unit = HP restored to target.

lull_atk/def_1.name: Lull Atk/Def 1
lull_atk/def_1.description: Inflicts Atk/Def-1 on foe and neutralizes foe's bonuses to Atk/Def (from skills like Fortify, Rally, etc.) during combat.

lull_atk/def_2.name: Lull Atk/Def 2
lull_atk/def_2.description: Inflicts Atk/Def-2 on foe and neutralizes foe's bonuses to Atk/Def (from skills like Fortify, Rally, etc.) during combat.

lull_atk/def_3.name: Lull Atk/Def 3
lull_atk/def_3.description: Inflicts Atk/Def-3 on foe and neutralizes foe's bonuses to Atk/Def (from skills like Fortify, Rally, etc.) during combat.

lull_atk/res_1.name: Lull Atk/Res 1
lull_atk/res_1.description: Inflicts Atk/Res-1 on foe and neutralizes foe's bonuses to Atk/Res (from skills like Fortify, Rally, etc.) during combat.

lull_atk/res_2.name: Lull Atk/Res 2
lull_atk/res_2.description: Inflicts Atk/Res-2 on foe and neutralizes foe's bonuses to Atk/Res (from skills like Fortify, Rally, etc.) during combat.

lull_atk/res_3.name: Lull Atk/Res 3
lull_atk/res_3.description: Inflicts Atk/Res-3 on foe and neutralizes foe's bonuses to Atk/Res (from skills like Fortify, Rally, etc.) during combat.

lull_atk/spd_1.name: Lull Atk/Spd 1
lull_atk/spd_1.description: Inflicts Atk/Spd-1 on foe and neutralizes foe's bonuses to Atk/Spd (from skills like Fortify, Rally, etc.) during combat.

lull_atk/spd_2.name: Lull Atk/Spd 2
lull_atk/spd_2.description: Inflicts Atk/Spd-2 on foe and neutralizes foe's bonuses to Atk/Spd (from skills like Fortify, Rally, etc.) during combat.

lull_atk/spd_3.name: Lull Atk/Spd 3
lull_atk/spd_3.description: Inflicts Atk/Spd-3 on foe and neutralizes foe's bonuses to Atk/Spd (from skills like Fortify, Rally, etc.) during combat.

lull_spd/def_1.name: Lull Spd/Def 1
lull_spd/def_1.description: Inflicts Spd/Def-1 on foe and neutralizes foe's bonuses to Spd/Def (from skills like Fortify, Rally, etc.) during combat.

lull_spd/def_2.name: Lull Spd/Def 2
lull_spd/def_2.description: Inflicts Spd/Def-2 on foe and neutralizes foe's bonuses to Spd/Def (from skills like Fortify, Rally, etc.) during combat.

lull_spd/def_3.name: Lull Spd/Def 3
lull_spd/def_3.description: Inflicts Spd/Def-3 on foe and neutralizes foe's bonuses to Spd/Def (from skills like Fortify, Rally, etc.) during combat.

lull_spd/res_1.name: Lull Spd/Res 1
lull_spd/res_1.description: Inflicts Spd/Res-1 on foe and neutralizes foe's bonuses to Spd/Res (from skills like Fortify, Rally, etc.) during combat.

lull_spd/res_2.name: Lull Spd/Res 2
lull_spd/res_2.description: Inflicts Spd/Res-2 on foe and neutralizes foe's bonuses to Spd/Res (from skills like Fortify, Rally, etc.) during combat.

lull_spd/res_3.name: Lull Spd/Res 3
lull_spd/res_3.description: Inflicts Spd/Res-3 on foe and neutralizes foe's bonuses to Spd/Res (from skills like Fortify, Rally, etc.) during combat.

lunar_brace.name: Lunar Brace
lunar_brace.description: Slows Special trigger (cooldown count+1).Deals damage = 50% of foe's Def when Special triggers.

lunge.name: Lunge
lunge.description: If unit initiates combat, unit and target foe swap spaces after combat.

mystic_boost_1.name: Mystic Boost 1
mystic_boost_1.description: Disables foe's skills that "calculate damage using the lower of foe's Def or Res" and "calculate damage from staff like other weapons." Restores 2 HP after combat.

mystic_boost_2.name: Mystic Boost 2
mystic_boost_2.description: Disables foe's skills that "calculate damage using the lower of foe's Def or Res" and "calculate damage from staff like other weapons." Restores 4 HP after combat.

mystic_boost_3.name: Mystic Boost 3
mystic_boost_3.description: Disables foe's skills that "calculate damage using the lower of foe's Def or Res" and "calculate damage from staff like other weapons." Restores 6 HP after combat.

null_c-disrupt_1.name: Null C-Disrupt 1
null_c-disrupt_1.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP = 100%, neutralizes effects that prevent unit's counterattacks during combat.

null_c-disrupt_2.name: Null C-Disrupt 2
null_c-disrupt_2.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 50%, neutralizes effects that prevent unit's counterattacks during combat.

null_c-disrupt_3.name: Null C-Disrupt 3
null_c-disrupt_3.description: Neutralizes effects that prevent unit's counterattacks during combat.

null_follow-up_1.name: Null Follow-Up 1
null_follow-up_1.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP = 100%, neutralizes effects that guarantee foe's follow-up attacks and effects that prevent unit's follow-up attacks during combat.

null_follow-up_2.name: Null Follow-Up 2
null_follow-up_2.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 50%, neutralizes effects that guarantee foe's follow-up attacks and effects that prevent unit's follow-up attacks during combat.

null_follow-up_3.name: Null Follow-Up 3
null_follow-up_3.description: Neutralizes effects that guarantee foe's follow-up attacks and effects that prevent unit's follow-up attacks during combat.

obstruct_1.name: Obstruct 1
obstruct_1.description: If unit's HP ≥ 90%, foes cannot move through spaces adjacent to unit.(Does not affect foes with Pass skills.)

obstruct_2.name: Obstruct 2
obstruct_2.description: If unit's HP ≥ 70%, foes cannot move through spaces adjacent to unit.(Does not affect foes with Pass skills.)

obstruct_3.name: Obstruct 3
obstruct_3.description: If unit's HP ≥ 50%, foes cannot move through spaces adjacent to unit.(Does not affect foes with Pass skills.)

odd_follow-up_1.name: Odd Follow-Up 1
odd_follow-up_1.description: If it is an odd-numbered turn and unit's HP = 100%, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack and foe cannot make a follow-up attack.

odd_follow-up_2.name: Odd Follow-Up 2
odd_follow-up_2.description: If it is an odd-numbered turn and unit's HP ≥ 50%, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack and foe cannot make a follow-up attack.

odd_follow-up_3.name: Odd Follow-Up 3
odd_follow-up_3.description: If it is an odd-numbered turn, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack and foe cannot make a follow-up attack.

odd_pulse_tie_1.name: Odd Pulse Tie 1
odd_pulse_tie_1.description: At start of odd-numbered turns, if any foe's HP+5 ≤ unit's HP and that foe's Special is ready, inflicts Special cooldown count+2 on foe with the lowest HP among those foes. (Cannot exceed the foe's maximum Special cooldown.)

odd_pulse_tie_2.name: Odd Pulse Tie 2
odd_pulse_tie_2.description: At start of odd-numbered turns, if any foe's HP+3 ≤ unit's HP and that foe's Special is ready, inflicts Special cooldown count+2 on foe with the lowest HP among those foes. (Cannot exceed the foe's maximum Special cooldown.)

odd_pulse_tie_3.name: Odd Pulse Tie 3
odd_pulse_tie_3.description: At start of odd-numbered turns, if any foe's HP+1 ≤ unit's HP and that foe's Special is ready, inflicts Special cooldown count+2 on foe with the lowest HP among those foes. (Cannot exceed the foe's maximum Special cooldown.)

pass_1.name: Pass 1
pass_1.description: If unit's HP ≥ 75%, unit can move through foes' spaces.

pass_2.name: Pass 2
pass_2.description: If unit's HP ≥ 50%, unit can move through foes' spaces.

pass_3.name: Pass 3
pass_3.description: If unit's HP ≥ 25%, unit can move through foes' spaces.

pegasus_flight_1.name: Pegasus Flight 1
pegasus_flight_1.description: At start of combat, if unit's Spd ≥ foe's Spd-7, inflicts penalty on foe's Atk/Def during combat = 30% of difference between Res stats (unit’s Res minus foe’s Res) before combat. (Maximum penalty of -3.)

pegasus_flight_2.name: Pegasus Flight 2
pegasus_flight_2.description: At start of combat, if unit's Spd ≥ foe's Spd-7, inflicts penalty on foe's Atk/Def during combat = 40% of difference between Res stats (unit’s Res minus foe’s Res) before combat. (Maximum penalty of -5.)

pegasus_flight_3.name: Pegasus Flight 3
pegasus_flight_3.description: At start of combat, if unit's Spd ≥ foe's Spd-7, inflicts penalty on foe's Atk/Def during combat = 50% of difference between Res stats (unit’s Res minus foe’s Res) before combat. (Maximum penalty of -7.)

poison_strike_1.name: Poison Strike 1
poison_strike_1.description: If unit initiates combat, deals 4 damage to foe after combat.

poison_strike_2.name: Poison Strike 2
poison_strike_2.description: If unit initiates combat, deals 7 damage to foe after combat.

poison_strike_3.name: Poison Strike 3
poison_strike_3.description: If unit initiates combat, deals 10 damage to foe after combat.

quick_riposte_1.name: Quick Riposte 1
quick_riposte_1.description: If unit's HP ≥ 90% and foe initiates combat, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack.

quick_riposte_2.name: Quick Riposte 2
quick_riposte_2.description: If unit's HP ≥ 80% and foe initiates combat, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack.

quick_riposte_3.name: Quick Riposte 3
quick_riposte_3.description: If unit's HP ≥ 70% and foe initiates combat, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack.

r_tomebreaker_1.name: R Tomebreaker 1
r_tomebreaker_1.description: If unit's HP ≥ 90% in combat against a red tome foe, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack and foe cannot make a follow-up attack.

r_tomebreaker_2.name: R Tomebreaker 2
r_tomebreaker_2.description: If unit's HP ≥ 70% in combat against a red tome foe, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack and foe cannot make a follow-up attack.

r_tomebreaker_3.name: R Tomebreaker 3
r_tomebreaker_3.description: If unit's HP ≥ 50% in combat against a red tome foe, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack and foe cannot make a follow-up attack.

raging_storm.name: Raging Storm
raging_storm.description: If unit initiates combat, grants another action to unit if unit is not adjacent to an ally after combat. (Once per turn. If a skill that moves unit after combat is used, references unit's position after that movement occurs.) If foe uses dragonstone or beast damage and unit is not adjacent to an ally, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack during combat.

recover_ring.name: Recover Ring
recover_ring.description: At start of turn, restores 10 HP.(Skill cannot be inherited.)

renewal_1.name: Renewal 1
renewal_1.description: At the start of every fourth turn, restores 10 HP.

renewal_2.name: Renewal 2
renewal_2.description: At the start of every third turn, restores 10 HP.

renewal_3.name: Renewal 3
renewal_3.description: At start of odd-numbered turns, restores 10 HP.

repel_1.name: Repel 1
repel_1.description: If unit's Spd > foe's Spd, reduces damage from attacks during combat and from area-of-effect Specials (excluding Røkkr area-of-effect Specials) by percentage = difference between stats × 2 (max 20%). If unit initiates combat, foe is moved 1 space away after combat.

repel_2.name: Repel 2
repel_2.description: If unit's Spd > foe's Spd, reduces damage from attacks during combat and from area-of-effect Specials (excluding Røkkr area-of-effect Specials) by percentage = difference between stats × 3 (max 30%). If unit initiates combat, foe is moved 1 space away after combat.

repel_3.name: Repel 3
repel_3.description: If unit's Spd > foe's Spd, reduces damage from attacks during combat and from area-of-effect Specials (excluding Røkkr area-of-effect Specials) by percentage = difference between stats × 4 (max 40%). If unit initiates combat, foe is moved 1 space away after combat.

res_feint_1.name: Res Feint 1
res_feint_1.description: If a Rally Assist skill is used by unit or targets unit, inflicts Res-3 on foes in cardinal directions of unit through their next actions.

res_feint_2.name: Res Feint 2
res_feint_2.description: If a Rally Assist skill is used by unit or targets unit, inflicts Res-5 on foes in cardinal directions of unit through their next actions.

res_feint_3.name: Res Feint 3
res_feint_3.description: If a Rally Assist skill is used by unit or targets unit, inflicts Res-7 on foes in cardinal directions of unit through their next actions.

rockslide_dance_1.name: Rockslide Dance 1
rockslide_dance_1.description: If Sing or Dance is used, grants Spd+2 and Def+3 to target.

rockslide_dance_2.name: Rockslide Dance 2
rockslide_dance_2.description: If Sing or Dance is used, grants Spd+3 and Def+4 to target.

s_drink.name: S Drink
s_drink.description: At the start of turn 1, restores 99 HP and grants Special cooldown count-1.

sabotage_atk_1.name: Sabotage Atk 1
sabotage_atk_1.description: At start of turn, if any foe's Res ≤ unit's Res-3 and that foe is adjacent to another foe, inflicts Atk-3 on that foe through its next action.

sabotage_atk_2.name: Sabotage Atk 2
sabotage_atk_2.description: At start of turn, if any foe's Res ≤ unit's Res-3 and that foe is adjacent to another foe, inflicts Atk-5 on that foe through its next action.

sabotage_atk_3.name: Sabotage Atk 3
sabotage_atk_3.description: At start of turn, if any foe's Res ≤ unit's Res-3 and that foe is adjacent to another foe, inflicts Atk-7 on that foe through its next action.

sabotage_def_1.name: Sabotage Def 1
sabotage_def_1.description: At start of turn, if any foe's Res ≤ unit's Res-3 and that foe is adjacent to another foe, inflicts Def-3 on that foe through its next action.

sabotage_def_2.name: Sabotage Def 2
sabotage_def_2.description: At start of turn, if any foe's Res ≤ unit's Res-3 and that foe is adjacent to another foe, inflicts Def-5 on that foe through its next action.

sabotage_def_3.name: Sabotage Def 3
sabotage_def_3.description: At start of turn, if any foe's Res ≤ unit's Res-3 and that foe is adjacent to another foe, inflicts Def-7 on that foe through its next action.

sabotage_res_1.name: Sabotage Res 1
sabotage_res_1.description: At start of turn, if any foe's Res ≤ unit's Res-3 and that foe is adjacent to another foe, inflicts Res-3 on that foe through its next action.

sabotage_res_2.name: Sabotage Res 2
sabotage_res_2.description: At start of turn, if any foe's Res ≤ unit's Res-3 and that foe is adjacent to another foe, inflicts Res-5 on that foe through its next action.

sabotage_res_3.name: Sabotage Res 3
sabotage_res_3.description: At start of turn, if any foe's Res ≤ unit's Res-3 and that foe is adjacent to another foe, inflicts Res-7 on that foe through its next action.

sabotage_spd_1.name: Sabotage Spd 1
sabotage_spd_1.description: At start of turn, if any foe's Res ≤ unit’s Res-3 and that foe is adjacent to another foe, inflicts Spd-3 on that foe through its next action.

sabotage_spd_2.name: Sabotage Spd 2
sabotage_spd_2.description: At start of turn, if any foe's Res ≤ unit’s Res-3 and that foe is adjacent to another foe, inflicts Spd-5 on that foe through its next action.

sabotage_spd_3.name: Sabotage Spd 3
sabotage_spd_3.description: At start of turn, if any foe's Res ≤ unit’s Res-3 and that foe is adjacent to another foe, inflicts Spd-7 on that foe through its next action.

sacae's_blessing.name: Sacae's Blessing
sacae's_blessing.description: If foe uses sword, lance, or axe, foe cannot counterattack.(Skill cannot be inherited.)

seal_atk_1.name: Seal Atk 1
seal_atk_1.description: Inflicts Atk-3 on foe through its next action after combat.

seal_atk_2.name: Seal Atk 2
seal_atk_2.description: Inflicts Atk-5 on foe through its next action after combat.

seal_atk_3.name: Seal Atk 3
seal_atk_3.description: Inflicts Atk-7 on foe through its next action after combat.

seal_atk/def_1.name: Seal Atk/Def 1
seal_atk/def_1.description: Inflicts Atk/Def-3 on foe through its next action after combat.

seal_atk/def_2.name: Seal Atk/Def 2
seal_atk/def_2.description: Inflicts Atk/Def-5 on foe through its next action after combat.

seal_atk/spd_1.name: Seal Atk/Spd 1
seal_atk/spd_1.description: Inflicts Atk/Spd-3 on foe through its next action after combat.

seal_atk/spd_2.name: Seal Atk/Spd 2
seal_atk/spd_2.description: Inflicts Atk/Spd-5 on foe through its next action after combat.

seal_def_1.name: Seal Def 1
seal_def_1.description: Inflicts Def-3 on foe through its next action after combat.

seal_def_2.name: Seal Def 2
seal_def_2.description: Inflicts Def-5 on foe through its next action after combat.

seal_def_3.name: Seal Def 3
seal_def_3.description: Inflicts Def-7 on foe through its next action after combat.

seal_def/res_1.name: Seal Def/Res 1
seal_def/res_1.description: Inflicts Def/Res-3 on foe through its next action after combat.

seal_def/res_2.name: Seal Def/Res 2
seal_def/res_2.description: Inflicts Def/Res-5 on foe through its next action after combat.

seal_res_1.name: Seal Res 1
seal_res_1.description: Inflicts Res-3 on foe through its next action after combat.

seal_res_2.name: Seal Res 2
seal_res_2.description: Inflicts Res-5 on foe through its next action after combat.

seal_res_3.name: Seal Res 3
seal_res_3.description: Inflicts Res-7 on foe through its next action after combat.

seal_spd_1.name: Seal Spd 1
seal_spd_1.description: Inflicts Spd-3 on foe through its next action after combat.

seal_spd_2.name: Seal Spd 2
seal_spd_2.description: Inflicts Spd-5 on foe through its next action after combat.

seal_spd_3.name: Seal Spd 3
seal_spd_3.description: Inflicts Spd-7 on foe through its next action after combat.

seal_spd/def_1.name: Seal Spd/Def 1
seal_spd/def_1.description: Inflicts Spd/Def-3 on foe through its next action after combat.

seal_spd/def_2.name: Seal Spd/Def 2
seal_spd/def_2.description: Inflicts Spd/Def-5 on foe through its next action after combat.

seal_spd/res_1.name: Seal Spd/Res 1
seal_spd/res_1.description: Inflicts Spd/Res-3 on foe through its next action after combat.

seal_spd/res_2.name: Seal Spd/Res 2
seal_spd/res_2.description: Inflicts Spd/Res-5 on foe through its next action after combat.

shield_pulse_1.name: Shield Pulse 1
shield_pulse_1.description: At the start of turn 1, if foe's attack triggers Special, grants Special cooldown count-1.

shield_pulse_2.name: Shield Pulse 2
shield_pulse_2.description: At the start of turn 1, if foe's attack triggers Special, grants Special cooldown count-1. Reduces damage dealt to unit by 5 when Special triggers.

shield_pulse_3.name: Shield Pulse 3
shield_pulse_3.description: At the start of turn 1, if foe's attack triggers Special, grants Special cooldown count-2. Reduces damage dealt to unit by 5 when Special triggers.

solar_brace.name: Solar Brace
solar_brace.description: Restores HP = 30% of damage dealt when Special triggers.(Stacks with effects of skills like Sol.)

soul_of_zofia.name: Soul of Zofia
soul_of_zofia.description: Neutralizes effects that guarantee foe's follow-up attacks or prevent unit's follow-up attacks during combat. If unit's HP ≤ 75% and unit initiates combat, unit can make a follow-up attack before foe can counterattack.

spd/def_link_1.name: Spd/Def Link 1
spd/def_link_1.description: If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition, Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets unit, grants Spd/Def+2 to unit and target ally or unit and targeting ally for 1 turn.

spd/def_link_2.name: Spd/Def Link 2
spd/def_link_2.description: If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition, Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets unit, grants Spd/Def+4 to unit and target ally or unit and targeting ally for 1 turn.

spd/def_link_3.name: Spd/Def Link 3
spd/def_link_3.description: If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition, Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets unit, grants Spd/Def+6 to unit and target ally or unit and targeting ally for 1 turn.

spd/def_ruse_1.name: Spd/Def Ruse 1
spd/def_ruse_1.description: If a Rally Assist skill is used by unit or targets unit, inflicts Spd/Def-1 and【Guard】on foes in cardinal directions of unit and target through their next actions.【Guard】Inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on target per attack during combat through its next action. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

spd/def_ruse_2.name: Spd/Def Ruse 2
spd/def_ruse_2.description: If a Rally Assist skill is used by unit or targets unit, inflicts Spd/Def-3 and【Guard】on foes in cardinal directions of unit and target through their next actions.【Guard】Inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on target per attack during combat through its next action. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

spd/def_ruse_3.name: Spd/Def Ruse 3
spd/def_ruse_3.description: If a Rally Assist skill is used by unit or targets unit, inflicts Spd/Def-5 and【Guard】on foes in cardinal directions of unit and target through their next actions.【Guard】Inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on target per attack during combat through its next action. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

spd/def_snag_1.name: Spd/Def Snag 1
spd/def_snag_1.description: If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition, Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets unit, inflicts Spd/Def-2 on nearest foes within 4 spaces of both unit and target through their next actions.

spd/def_snag_2.name: Spd/Def Snag 2
spd/def_snag_2.description: If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition, Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets unit, inflicts Spd/Def-4 on nearest foes within 4 spaces of both unit and target through their next actions.

spd/def_snag_3.name: Spd/Def Snag 3
spd/def_snag_3.description: If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition, Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets unit, inflicts Spd/Def-6 on nearest foes within 4 spaces of both unit and targeted ally through their next action.

spd_feint_1.name: Spd Feint 1
spd_feint_1.description: If a Rally Assist skill is used by unit or targets unit, inflicts Spd-3 on foes in cardinal directions of unit through their next actions.

spd_feint_2.name: Spd Feint 2
spd_feint_2.description: If a Rally Assist skill is used by unit or targets unit, inflicts Spd-5 on foes in cardinal directions of unit through their next actions.

spd_feint_3.name: Spd Feint 3
spd_feint_3.description: If a Rally Assist skill is used by unit or targets unit, inflicts Spd-7 on foes in cardinal directions of unit through their next actions.

spd/res_link_1.name: Spd/Res Link 1
spd/res_link_1.description: If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition, Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets unit, grants Spd/Res+2 to unit and target ally or unit and targeting ally for 1 turn.

spd/res_link_2.name: Spd/Res Link 2
spd/res_link_2.description: If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition, Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets unit, grants Spd/Res+4 to unit and target ally or unit and targeting ally for 1 turn.

spd/res_link_3.name: Spd/Res Link 3
spd/res_link_3.description: If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition, Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets unit, grants Spd/Res+6 to unit and target ally or unit and targeting ally for 1 turn.

spd/res_ruse_1.name: Spd/Res Ruse 1
spd/res_ruse_1.description: If a Rally Assist skill is used by unit or targets unit, inflicts Spd/Res-1 and【Guard】on foes in cardinal directions of unit and target through their next actions.【Guard】Inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on target per attack during combat through its next action. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

spd/res_ruse_2.name: Spd/Res Ruse 2
spd/res_ruse_2.description: If a Rally Assist skill is used by unit or targets unit, inflicts Spd/Res-3 and【Guard】on foes in cardinal directions of unit and target through their next actions.【Guard】Inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on target per attack during combat through its next action. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

spd/res_ruse_3.name: Spd/Res Ruse 3
spd/res_ruse_3.description: If a Rally Assist skill is used by unit or targets unit, inflicts Spd/Res-5 and【Guard】on foes in cardinal directions of unit and target through their next actions.【Guard】Inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on target per attack during combat through its next action. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

spd/res_snag_1.name: Spd/Res Snag 1
spd/res_snag_1.description: If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition, Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets unit, inflicts Spd/Res-2 on nearest foes within 4 spaces of both unit and target through their next actions.

spd/res_snag_2.name: Spd/Res Snag 2
spd/res_snag_2.description: If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition, Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets unit, inflicts Spd/Res-4 on nearest foes within 4 spaces of both unit and target through their next actions.

spd/res_snag_3.name: Spd/Res Snag 3
spd/res_snag_3.description: If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition, Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets unit, inflicts Spd/Res-6 on nearest foes within 4 spaces of both unit and target through their next actions.

special_fighter_1.name: Special Fighter 1
special_fighter_1.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 90%, grants Special cooldown charge +1 to unit and inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on foe per attack. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

special_fighter_2.name: Special Fighter 2
special_fighter_2.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 70%, grants Special cooldown charge +1 to unit and inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on foe per attack. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

special_fighter_3.name: Special Fighter 3
special_fighter_3.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 50%, grants Special cooldown charge +1 to unit and inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on foe per attack. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

special_spiral_1.name: Special Spiral 1
special_spiral_1.description: If unit initiates combat and unit's Special triggers before or during combat, grants Special cooldown count-1 after combat.

special_spiral_2.name: Special Spiral 2
special_spiral_2.description: If Special triggers before or during combat, grants Special cooldown count-1 after combat.

special_spiral_3.name: Special Spiral 3
special_spiral_3.description: If Special triggers before or during combat, grants Special cooldown count-2 after combat.

spurn_1.name: Spurn 1
spurn_1.description: If unit's Spd > foe's Spd, reduces damage from attacks during combat and from area-of-effect Specials (excluding Røkkr area-of-effect Specials) by percentage = difference between stats × 2 (max 20%). If unit's HP ≤ 25% and unit's attack triggers Special, deals +5 damage when Special triggers.

spurn_2.name: Spurn 2
spurn_2.description: If unit's Spd > foe's Spd, reduces damage from attacks during combat and from area-of-effect Specials (excluding Røkkr area-of-effect Specials) by percentage = difference between stats × 3 (max 30%). If unit's HP ≤ 50% and unit's attack triggers Special, deals +5 damage when Special triggers.

spurn_3.name: Spurn 3
spurn_3.description: If unit's Spd > foe's Spd, reduces damage from attacks during combat and from area-of-effect Specials (excluding Røkkr area-of-effect Specials) by percentage = difference between stats × 4 (max 40%). If unit's HP ≤ 75% and unit's attack triggers Special, deals +5 damage when Special triggers.

sudden_panic_1.name: Sudden Panic 1
sudden_panic_1.description: At start of turn, if any foe's HP ≤ unit's HP-5 and that foe is adjacent to another foe, inflicts 【Panic】on that foe.【Panic】Converts bonuses on target into penalties through its next action.

sudden_panic_2.name: Sudden Panic 2
sudden_panic_2.description: At start of turn, if any foe's HP ≤ unit's HP-3 and that foe is adjacent to another foe, inflicts 【Panic】on that foe.【Panic】Converts bonuses on target into penalties through its next action.

sudden_panic_3.name: Sudden Panic 3
sudden_panic_3.description: At start of turn, if any foe's HP ≤ unit's HP-1 and that foe is adjacent to another foe, inflicts 【Panic】on that foe.【Panic】Converts bonuses on target into penalties through its next action.

swordbreaker_1.name: Swordbreaker 1
swordbreaker_1.description: If unit's HP ≥ 90% in combat against a sword foe, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack and foe cannot make a follow-up attack.

swordbreaker_2.name: Swordbreaker 2
swordbreaker_2.description: If unit's HP ≥ 70% in combat against a sword foe, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack and foe cannot make a follow-up attack.

swordbreaker_3.name: Swordbreaker 3
swordbreaker_3.description: If unit's HP ≥ 50% in combat against a sword foe, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack and foe cannot make a follow-up attack.

torrent_dance_1.name: Torrent Dance 1
torrent_dance_1.description: If Sing or Dance is used, grants Res+3 to target.

torrent_dance_2.name: Torrent Dance 2
torrent_dance_2.description: If Sing or Dance is used, grants Res+4 to target.

torrent_dance_3.name: Torrent Dance 3
torrent_dance_3.description: If Sing or Dance is used, grants Res+5 to target.

vantage_1.name: Vantage 1
vantage_1.description: If unit's HP ≤ 25% and foe initiates combat, unit can counterattack before foe's first attack.

vantage_2.name: Vantage 2
vantage_2.description: If unit's HP ≤ 50% and foe initiates combat, unit can counterattack before foe's first attack.

vantage_3.name: Vantage 3
vantage_3.description: If unit's HP ≤ 75% and foe initiates combat, unit can counterattack before foe's first attack.

vengeful_fighter_1.name: Vengeful Fighter 1
vengeful_fighter_1.description: If unit's HP ≥ 90% and foe initiates combat, grants Special cooldown charge +1 per unit's attack, and unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack. (Does not stack.)

vengeful_fighter_2.name: Vengeful Fighter 2
vengeful_fighter_2.description: If unit's HP ≥ 70% and foe initiates combat, grants Special cooldown charge +1 per unit's attack, and unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack. (Does not stack.)

vengeful_fighter_3.name: Vengeful Fighter 3
vengeful_fighter_3.description: If unit's HP ≥ 50% and foe initiates combat, grants Special cooldown charge +1 per unit's attack, and unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack. (Does not stack.)

warp_powder.name: Warp Powder
warp_powder.description: If unit's HP ≥ 80%, unit can move to a space adjacent to any ally within 2 spaces.

wary_fighter_1.name: Wary Fighter 1
wary_fighter_1.description: If unit's HP ≥ 90%, unit and foe cannot make a follow-up attack.

wary_fighter_2.name: Wary Fighter 2
wary_fighter_2.description: If unit's HP ≥ 70%, unit and foe cannot make a follow-up attack.

wary_fighter_3.name: Wary Fighter 3
wary_fighter_3.description: If unit's HP ≥ 50%, unit and foe cannot make a follow-up attack.

watersweep_1.name: Watersweep 1
watersweep_1.description: If unit initiates combat, unit cannot make a follow-up attack. If unit's Spd ≥ foe's Spd+5 and foe uses magic, staff, or dragonstone, foe cannot counterattack.

watersweep_2.name: Watersweep 2
watersweep_2.description: If unit initiates combat, unit cannot make a follow-up attack. If unit's Spd ≥ foe's Spd+3 and foe uses magic, staff, or dragonstone, foe cannot counterattack.

watersweep_3.name: Watersweep 3
watersweep_3.description: If unit initiates combat, unit cannot make a follow-up attack. If unit's Spd > foe's Spd and foe uses magic, staff, or dragonstone, foe cannot counterattack.

windsweep_1.name: Windsweep 1
windsweep_1.description: If unit initiates combat, unit cannot make a follow-up attack. If unit’s Spd ≥ foe’s Spd+5 and foe uses sword, lance, axe, bow, dagger, or beast damage, foe cannot counterattack.

windsweep_2.name: Windsweep 2
windsweep_2.description: If unit initiates combat, unit cannot make a follow-up attack. If unit’s Spd ≥ foe’s Spd+3 and foe uses sword, lance, axe, bow, dagger, or beast damage, foe cannot counterattack.

windsweep_3.name: Windsweep 3
windsweep_3.description: If unit initiates combat, unit cannot make a follow-up attack. If unit’s Spd > foe’s Spd and foe uses sword, lance, axe, bow, dagger, or beast damage, foe cannot counterattack.

wings_of_mercy_1.name: Wings of Mercy 1
wings_of_mercy_1.description: If an ally's HP ≤ 30%, unit can move to a space adjacent to that ally.

wings_of_mercy_2.name: Wings of Mercy 2
wings_of_mercy_2.description: If an ally's HP ≤ 40%, unit can move to a space adjacent to that ally.

wings_of_mercy_3.name: Wings of Mercy 3
wings_of_mercy_3.description: If an ally's HP ≤ 50%, unit can move to a space adjacent to that ally.

wrath_1.name: Wrath 1
wrath_1.description: At start of turn, if unit's HP ≤ 25% and unit's attack triggers Special, grants Special cooldown count-1, and deals +10 damage when Special triggers.

wrath_2.name: Wrath 2
wrath_2.description: At start of turn, if unit's HP ≤ 50% and unit's attack triggers Special, grants Special cooldown count-1, and deals +10 damage when Special triggers.

wrath_3.name: Wrath 3
wrath_3.description: At start of turn, if unit's HP ≤ 75% and unit's attack triggers Special, grants Special cooldown count-1, and deals +10 damage when Special triggers.

wrathful_staff_1.name: Wrathful Staff 1
wrathful_staff_1.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP = 100%, calculates damage from staff like other weapons.

wrathful_staff_2.name: Wrathful Staff 2
wrathful_staff_2.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 50%, calculates damage from staff like other weapons.

wrathful_staff_3.name: Wrathful Staff 3
wrathful_staff_3.description: Calculates damage from staff like other weapons.

yune's_whispers.name: Yune's Whispers
yune's_whispers.description: At start of turn, if any foe's Res ≤ unit's Res-3 and that foe is adjacent to another foe, inflicts Atk/Spd-6 on that foe through its next action.
